peripheral.title: Timer 16-bit
peripheral.extract: General purpose timer with 16 bits precisions
peripheral.help_text:
General-purpose timers are used in any application for output compare (timing and delay generation),
one-pulse mode, input capture (for external signal frequency measurement), sensor interface (encoder, hall sensor).
